meanings.definition: Having a projecting lower jaw or chin.
meanings.sent1: The bulldog's prognathous jaw made it easier for him to chew his food.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the prognathous skull of the ancient human remains.
meanings.sent3: The prognathous jaw of the cartoon character made him look quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Her prognathous chin jutted out like a cliff on her face.
meanings.sent5: The prognathous jaw of the wolf gave it a fierce appearance.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a protruding jaw or jaws.
meanings.sent1: The tribal mask had a prognathous feature that symbolized strength.
meanings.sent2: The fisherman caught a rare fish with a prognathous mouth.
meanings.sent3: The prognathous jaw of the robot toy made it look futuristic.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range had a prognathous shape against the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The prognathous jaw of the dinosaur fossil amazed the paleontologists.
